rules_locked.highlights_scope: weekly_highlights shows ONLY events in the current week (Sun–Sun). Max 4.
rules_locked.venue_regulars: Do not change unless explicitly requested.
rules_locked.venue_specials: Future-dated events are retained indefinitely; no cutoff.
rules_locked.sports: Full season schedules live in sports_schedules; Metro Sports shows only this week.
rules_locked.fairs: Only active/coming fairs; expired fairs removed.
rules_locked.goldfish_paragraph: Persist in GOLDFISH SWIM SCHOOL (MOORE) → regular.

local_updates: Yukon Christmas in the Park open nightly through Dec 31.
Stockyards City Christmas Parade happens Dec 6 at 10 AM.
The Station Christmas Light Show runs nightly Nov 28 – Jan 1.
Sparkle Holiday Market at Scissortail Park: Dec 12, Dec 19.
Remington Park Classic Christmas Walk-Thru runs through Dec 28.
OKC Zoo Safari Lights open nightly through Jan 12, 2026.
Orr Family Farm Holiday Festival open through Dec 22.
Frontier City Holiday in the Park active through December.
Norman Christmas Market on Dec 6 at First Presbyterian Church.
